description:
TaskBar 2022 displays icons of running applications and favorites on the top panel or alternatively on a new bottom panel. Activate, minimize or close tasks with a simple click. 

TaskBar 2022 is a dock-like windows list on the top/bottom bar. 

Fork of c0ldplasma/gnome-shell-extension-taskbar to support newer versions of GNOME 

Please submit issues to: https://github.com/hrishi2402/gnome-shell-extension-taskbar/issues/new/choose
name: TaskBar 2022
